statements: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, location FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, location FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE location = 'New York' AND is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 2002;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, amount, location FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND is_fraudulent = TRUE
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE location LIKE 'New York%'
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM anomalies ORDER BY detection_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_time, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'refund' AND amount < 0;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.user_id, t.amount, t.transaction_time, a.anomaly_reason FROM transactions AS t INNER JOIN anomalies AS a ON t.transaction_id = a.transaction_id;
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(amount) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT transaction_id, detection_timestamp, fraud_probability FROM fraud_detection_logs WHERE fraud_probability > 0.5 ORDER BY detection_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = 'aeb8457e-1c9d-4362-9014-f6e75e7ef99b';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, detection_timestamp, fraud_probability FROM fraud_detection_logs WHERE fraud_probability > 0.8 ORDER BY detection_timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, alert_type FROM alerts WHERE is_resolved = FALSE ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, anomaly_score FROM anomaly_scores WHERE anomaly_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE is_verified = FALSE
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1024
SELECT alert_type, is_resolved FROM alerts WHERE alert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT * FROM transaction_data ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transaction_data WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profile WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, anomaly_score FROM anomaly_detection_results WHERE anomaly_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM fraud_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_timestamp FROM transaction_data WHERE is_fraudulent = true ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, t.transaction_timestamp FROM user_profile u JOIN transaction_data t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount < 500 ORDER BY t.transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT a.result_id, a.anomaly_score, a.detected_at, u.username FROM anomaly_detection_results a JOIN user_profile u ON a.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY a.anomaly_score DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT f.transaction_id, f.alert_message, a.anomaly_score, u.username FROM fraud_alerts f JOIN anomaly_detection_results a ON f.transaction_id = a.transaction_id JOIN user_profile u ON f.user_id = u.user_id WHERE a.anomaly_score > 0.8 ORDER BY f.alert_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
